caption.p: Hotspot map of anti–Rift Valley fever virus antibody prevalence, adjusted for age, 1 in 462 humans on 189 ruminant livestock and game farms in the study area in central South Africa, sampled during 2015–2016. 1 Difference of RVFV observed seroprevalence and predicted seroprevalence (by logistic regression model including age) by farm.
